title: How come I can't deselect the Chatroom's "Autojoin on Startup" option?
body:
http://imgur.com/gallery/c0AtH 
**(Club and summoner names covered up; not a visual bug)**

How come I'm unable to deselect the "Autojoin on Startup" option? 
I'm able to deselect the "Show Time Stamp" option but not the auto-join because it's grayed out.

replies.body:
It doesn't look like this is a feature that can be used at the moment, as I verified it with a few team members. I'm not sure what the status is of this feature or whether this is intentional, but it doesn't look like it's available right now.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
